help-texts.liReload: Click here to [b]reload[/b] current data in report(s).
help-texts.liRestart: Click here to remove all reports and start from scratch.
help-texts.nbu_reports: Click here to add various [b]NBU[/b] related reports
help-texts.daily_bsr: Click here to add [b]Daily BSR[/b] reports
help-texts.bsr: Click here to add [b]Global BSR[/b] reports
help-texts.vaults: Click here to add various [b]NBU Vault[/b] related reports
help-texts.audits: Click here to add [b]audit[/b] related reports
help-texts.liActions: Click here to send, save or schedule the current report(s) in either [b]HTML[/b] or [b]CSV[/b] format.
help-texts.liTower: Click here to select a specific [b]Tower[/b] or all towers.
help-texts.liCustomer: Click here to select a specific [b]Customer[/b] or all customers.
help-texts.liTimePeriod: Click here to select a specific [b]Time period[/b].
help-texts.remove: Click here to remove the report.
help-texts.refreshData: Click here to load or refresh the data based on current conditions and sorts.
help-texts.pagination: Click here to toggle [b]pagination[/b] i.e. to show all rows at once, or show 10 rows per page.
help-texts.prevpage: Click here to go to [b]previous[/b] page.
help-texts.nextpage: Click here to go to [b]next[/b] page.
help-texts.modal-field: Select the [b]report field[/b] used in the filter/sort.
help-texts.modal-operator: Select the [b]operator[/b] used in the filter.
help-texts.modal-save: Save the report(s) as [b]user report[/b] now.
help-texts.modal-send: Send the report to recipients now.
help-texts.liLogout: Click here to return to [b]User interface[/b].
help-texts.signin: Enter your user name and password, then click [b]Sign in[/b] button.
help-texts.nbu_event: Click the button to execute the routine. It should be executed auomaticlaly each 5 minutes.
help-texts.nbu_maintenance: Click the button tho execute the database maintenance.
help-texts.upload: Click the [b]Select package[/b] button to select the package *.zip file.[br][/br]Then click [b]Upload package[/b] button to tranfer the file to web/DB server for installation.
help-texts.gotop: Click here to return to the top of the page.
help-texts.Add: Click here to add new item to the list.
help-texts.Update: Click here to modify the item details.
help-texts.Close: Close the window without any action.
help-texts.add: Add the item to the database.
help-texts.upd: Update the item in the database.
help-texts.del: Mark the item in the database as obsolete.
help-texts.modal-name: Enter the item [b]name[/b]. This field must be unique.
help-texts.modal-pattern: Enter the item substring [b]pattern[/b]. You can use regular experessions and wildcards.
help-texts.modal-ord: Enter the [b]order[/b] number, in which it will appear in the list.
help-texts.modal-title: Enter the report [b]name[/b]. It may contain special characters and spaces.
help-texts.modal-tower: Select a specific [b]Tower[/b] or all leave empty for towers.
help-texts.modal-customer: Select a specific [b]Customer[/b] or leave empty for all customers.
help-texts.modal-timeperiod: Select a specific [b]Time period[/b], or leave empty for no time period restriction.
help-texts.modal-to: Enter the report's main [b]recipent list[/b]. Separate multiple entries with comma (,) or semicolon (;).
help-texts.modal-cc: Enter the report's CC [b]recipent list[/b]. Separate multiple entries with comma (,) or semicolon (;).
help-texts.modal-mode: Select whether you want the report to be in [b]HTML[/b] (hypertext markup, useful for distribution) or in [b]CSV[/b] (comma-separated values, useful for Excel manipulation) format.
help-texts.modal-date: Enter the [b]date[/b] match pattern. You can use any part of the 'Thu 8. Feb 2018' date format (i.e. '[b]Thu[/b]' for each Thursday, '[b]8.[/b]' for each eighth). Leave [b]empty[/b] for daily report.
help-texts.modal-time: Enter the [b]time[/b] match pattern. You can use any part of the 'HH:MM' time format (i.e. '[b]:00[/b]' for each full hour).
